feed.title: GitLab Backups for Bitcoin Core repository

entry.title: GitLab Backups for Bitcoin Core repository
entry.summary: The suggestion to include a section on existing backups in the [Bitcoin Core development wiki](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/bitcoin-devwiki/wiki/GitHub-alternatives-for-Bitcoin-Core) proposes an enhancement that could significantly benefit users and contributors. This addition aims to provide comprehensive insights into the backup solutions available for Bitcoin Core, ensuring that stakeholders have access to necessary information for effective decision-making and operational continuity. The proposition underscores the importance of documenting and centralizing knowledge regarding alternative platforms and backup strategies, thereby facilitating easier navigation and understanding for those involved in Bitcoin Core's development and maintenance.
